entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 p.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
